tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, a failure of, i.e. (used only as a negative particle, usually with a prepositional prefix) not, except, without, unless, besides, because not, until, etc.

tokens.resolved_gloss: to cut (off, down or asunder); by implication, to destroy or consume; specifically, to covenant (i.e. make an alliance or bargain, originally by cutting flesh and passing between the pieces)
